title: Classic Sci-Fi Collection
summary: Groundbreaking science fiction films from the golden age of cinema that defined the genre.
description: This collection features iconic science fiction films from the 1950s through the 1990s, including groundbreaking works that explored space travel, artificial intelligence, and dystopian futures. These films not only entertained but also sparked important conversations about technology and society.

title: 90s Comedy Essentials
summary: The funniest comedies from the 1990s that still make us laugh today.
description: From slapstick to satire, the 1990s produced some of the most quotable and rewatchable comedies in cinema history. This collection brings together the decade's best laughs, featuring everything from romantic comedies to buddy comedies to absurdist humor.

title: Award-Winning Dramas
summary: Oscar and Golden Globe winning dramatic films that showcase exceptional storytelling.
description: These critically acclaimed dramas have received the highest honors in cinema. Each film in this collection has won major awards for its powerful performances, compelling narratives, and artistic achievement. Essential viewing for serious film enthusiasts.

title: Action Movie Blockbusters
summary: Heart-pounding action films with explosive sequences and memorable heroes.
description: This collection features the biggest action blockbusters that revolutionized the genre with their spectacular stunts, intense fight choreography, and pulse-pounding chase scenes. From Die Hard to Mission: Impossible, these films defined modern action cinema.

title: Family Adventure Favorites
summary: Timeless adventures perfect for family movie night.
description: These heartwarming adventures bring families together with stories of courage, friendship, and discovery. Featuring animated classics and live-action adventures that appeal to viewers of all ages, this collection is perfect for creating lasting memories.

title: Psychological Thrillers
summary: Mind-bending thrillers that will keep you guessing until the end.
description: These masterfully crafted psychological thrillers explore the darker corners of the human mind. With plot twists, unreliable narrators, and atmospheric tension, these films challenge viewers to question reality and solve complex mysteries.

title: Romantic Classics
summary: Timeless love stories that have captured hearts for generations.
description: From epic romances to intimate love stories, this collection celebrates the power of love on screen. These films have become cultural touchstones, featuring unforgettable couples and moments that define romance in cinema.

title: Indie Film Gems
summary: Hidden treasures from independent cinema that deserve wider recognition.
description: These independent films showcase unique voices and innovative storytelling outside the Hollywood mainstream. Often made on smaller budgets but with enormous creativity, these gems offer fresh perspectives and artistic excellence.
